Key Match Events: Naseem Shah hit back-to-back sixes to win the match
Shadab Khan top-scored with a knock of 36 runs off 26 balls
Fazalhaq Farooqi and Fareed Ahmad took three wickets each for Afghanistan
Ibrahim Zadran helped Afghanistan post 129 for six in 20 overs
Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan captain Mohammad Nabi said, 'We will try and put a big score on the board'
Pakistan captain Babar Azam said, 'The mood is cool and calm, and we will try to continue that momentum'
Babar Azam won the toss and Pakistan decided to bowl first
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan defeated Afghanistan by one wicket in their Super 4 match of Asia Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Sharjah Stadium in Sharjah, on Wednesday
